00034 
00036 const QString CTooltipManager::textForHyperlink( const QString& link ){
00037   QString moduleName;
00038   QString keyName;
00039     CReferenceManager::Type type;
00040 
00041     CReferenceManager::decodeHyperlink(link, moduleName, keyName, type);
00042   if (moduleName.isEmpty()) {
00043     moduleName = CReferenceManager::preferredModule( type );
00044   }
00045   if (moduleName.isEmpty())
00046     return QString::null;
00047 
00048   CSwordModuleInfo* m = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName);    
00049     return QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1</B><HR>%2").arg(keyText(m ? m->type() : CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown, keyName)).arg(moduleText(moduleName, keyName));
00050 }
00051 
00053 const QString CTooltipManager::textForReference( const QString& moduleName, const QString& keyName, const QString& description){
00054     CSwordModuleInfo* module = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName);
00055   return QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1 %2</B>%3<HR>%4")
00056     .arg(i18n("Bookmark to"))
00057     .arg(keyText(module ? module->type() : CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown, keyName))
00058     .arg(!description.isEmpty() ? QString::fromLatin1("<FONT color=\"#800000\">(%1)</FONT><BR>").arg(description.stripWhiteSpace()) : QString::null )
00059     .arg(moduleText(moduleName, keyName));
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00064 const QString CTooltipManager::moduleText( const QString& moduleName, const QString& keyName){
00065   QString text = QString::null;
00066     CSwordModuleInfo* module = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName);
00067     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(module) );
00068     key->key( keyName );
00069 
00070   if (module) {
00071     backend()->setFilterOptions( CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults() );
00072     text = key->renderedText();
00073 
00074         if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) {
00075         qWarning("BIBLE or Commentary!!");
00076       text = QString::null;
00077       ListKey verses = VerseKey().ParseVerseList((const char*)keyName.local8Bit(), "Genesis 1:1", true);
00078             
00079         for (int i = 0; i < verses.Count(); ++i) {
00080             VerseKey* element = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(verses.GetElement(i));
00081             if (element) {
00082                 VerseKey lowerBound = element->LowerBound();
00083                     VerseKey upperBound = element->UpperBound();
00084             
00085             while (lowerBound < upperBound) {
00086                 key->key( (const char*)lowerBound );
00087                     text += QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1</B> %2<BR>").arg(lowerBound.Verse()).arg(key->renderedText());
00088                         lowerBound++;
00089           }
00090           if (lowerBound == upperBound) {
00091                 key->key( (const char*)lowerBound );
00092                     text += QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1</B> %2").arg(lowerBound.Verse()).arg(key->renderedText());
00093           }
00094                 }
00095             else {
00096                 key->key( (const char*)(*verses.GetElement(i))  );
00097                     text += key->renderedText();
00098         }
00099         }
00100         }
00101     }
00102     return text;
00103 }
00104 
00106 const QString CTooltipManager::keyText( const CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType moduleType, const QString& keyName ){
00107     if (moduleType == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || moduleType == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) {
00108      QString text = QString::null;
00109         ListKey keys = VerseKey().ParseVerseList((const char*)keyName.local8Bit(),"Genesis 1:1", true);
00110       if (VerseKey* element = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(keys.GetElement(0)))
00111             return QString::fromLatin1("%1-%2").arg((const char*)element->LowerBound()).arg((const char*)element->UpperBound());
00112       else
00113         return QString::fromLatin1("%1").arg((const char*)(*keys.GetElement(0)));
00114       return text;
00115   }
00116   else { //non-versekeys are not localized
00117         return keyName;
00118   };
00119   return QString::null;
00120 }
